alert.note: Alert for Dixie; Lafayette; Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 9:46PM EDT until June 14 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lafayette County in Big Bend of Florida... Northern Dixie County in Big Bend of Florida... Taylor County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 1100 PM EDT. * At 946 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles west of Madison to 18 miles east of St. Marks to 12 miles south of Crawfordville, moving southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mayo, Perry, Steinhatchee, Pinland, Tennille, Jug Island, Clara, Buckville, Scanlon, Dekle Beach, Jonesboro, Jack Lee Island, Grady, Hatch Bend, Foley, Salem, Perry-Foley Airport, San Pedro Junction, Hampton Springs and Cedar Island. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for Big Bend of Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for Big Bend of Florida.
